title: A Visit to a ....: a sheep farm, a dairy, an airport, a container port
creator_credit: Yvonne MacKay, Dell King, Dave Gibson and Gibson Film Productions
brief_description: A compilation tape containing programs about two children who visit a dairy farm, a sheep farm, an airport and a container port. Reveals the daily and seasonal life of each venue.
